title: Bill to ban mRNA vaccines passes out of House committee
author: KATE HESTON
description: A bill that would ban the use of mRNA vaccines, including for Covid-19, is on its way to the House floor after passing out of committee in a party-line vote Wednesday.
tags: Montana, mRNA vaccines, House Bill 371, greg kmetz, covid-19 vaccine, house judiciary committee, republican support, health care choice, vaccine ban, vaccine safety
cntitle: 禁止 mRNA 疫苗的法案在众议院委员会获得通过
cndescription: 一项禁止使用 mRNA 疫苗（包括 Covid-19 疫苗）的法案在周三以党派投票方式通过委员会后，即将提交众议院全体会议审议。
